pr_title: [FLINK-15942] Do not log huge/infinite cpu/memory resources in profiles

timeline.message: [FLINK-15942] Do not log huge/infinite cpu/memory resources in profiles

timeline.author: tillrohrmann

timeline.bodyText: I think we could simplify the assertion a bit by testing whether the string contains cpuCores and a configured memory.
timeline.author: tillrohrmann

replies.bodyText: Alright, I would just make sure that the right positions of commas are covered
replies.author: azagrebin
